items.title: RBI unveils norms to enable faster transmission of rates
items.summary: Under the revised directions on interest rate on advances, banks will now be allowed to reduce spread components on floating rate loans before the current three-year lock-in period, a move aimed at benefiting borrowers. This could result in faster transmission of rate cuts, leading to lower EMIs or interest outgo. Additionally, banks may offer borrowers the option to switch to fixed-rate loans at the time of interest rate resets, though this will no longer be mandatory.

These changes were announced via a circular.

items.summary: India’s foreign exchange reserves fell by $396 million to $702.57 billion for the week ending September 19, according to Reserve Bank of India data released on Friday. The reserves had risen by $4.69 billion in the previous week and had touched a record $704.885 billion in late September 2024.

items.title: India's food processing sector gets  ₹1.02 trillion investment pledges

items.title: India's first reaction to Trump's 100% tariffs on drug imports: ‘Closely monitoring’

items.title: India's Industrial Production growth at 4.0 per cent in August
items.summary: India's industrial production growth accelerated to 4 per cent in August from 3.5 per cent in July, NSO data revealed. This surge was primarily driven by the mining sector's 6.0 per cent output growth in August 2025. Manufacturing production also rose by 3.8 per cent, with power increasing 4.1 per cent in August 2025.

Washington pushes for American soybean and corn purchases. India resists due to GM concerns. Talks continue to meet a fall deadline for a bilateral trade agreement.

items.title: India must weave biofuels into a rural energy network
items.summary: India’s biofuel programme has served farmers well. To boost rural incomes, let’s now use fiscal resources to weave it into a wider web of rural feedstock supplies from diverse sources. The gains could justify the outlays.

items.summary: India made a massive purchase of soyoil from Argentina. The purchase occurred over two days. This is the largest such purchase ever. Argentina scrapped export taxes, leading to the deal. The move may impact palm oil shipments from Indonesia and Malaysia. The soyoil is for shipment between October and March. This deal highlights the impact of Argentina's policy change.

Additionally, probes were initiated on mobile covers from China and 4-ADPA from China and the EU, citing prima facie evidence of dumped imports causing material injury to domestic industries.

items.title: India begins anti-dumping probe against China, South Korea, Vietnam and Thailand
items.summary: The Directorate General of Trade Remedies (DGTR) has launched anti-dumping investigations on solar encapsulants (excluding EVA) from China, South Korea, Vietnam, and Thailand, following a petition by RenewSys India. Additional probes target mobile covers from China and a rubber chemical intermediate, 4-ADPA, from China and the EU. The investigations cite prima facie evidence of injury to domestic industries.

items.summary: These two projects are part of the first set of rail connectivity projects between India and Bhutan, foreign secretary Vikram Misri announced at a press conference that was also addressed by the railway minister.

items.summary: The ₹305 crore centre will be an agency responsible for the overall development of the capabilities of the Indian shipbuilding sector

items.summary: Success doesn’t always bring confidence. Many high achievers quietly struggle with self-doubt, wondering if they’ve fooled everyone. Even Einstein felt over-celebrated. Understanding imposter syndrome is the first step to addressing it.

Mining and electricity supported overall growth. Economists expect a rebound in September-October, driven by festive demand and GST cuts. Consumer durables and non-durables contracted, while infrastructure goods saw strong growth at 10.6%.

It will feature luxury homes, villas, and serviced apartments. The first phase, comprising 330 units, sold out at launch. This development aims to transform Alibaug's real estate landscape for investors.
